definition: base solvent (of chemical compound)/stroma (framing biological tissue)

sentences.english: Humus soil is the best culture substrate for Chinese pine.

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of acute leukemic bone marrow stroma in leukemia development.

sentences.english: The rooting medium should be moist, well aerated, and sterile .

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether fetal bone marrow stromal cells have hemang ioblastic characteristics.

sentences.english: Liver fibrosis is a wound healing process characterized by accumulation of extracellular matrix proteins.

sentences.english: Collagen (type IV in basement membrane and types V and VI as fine fibrils ) comprises the structural component of ECM that provides shape and stability.
sentences.chinese: 胶原是细胞外基质的结构性成份，维持形状和稳定性。

sentences.english: A reminder that bone marrow is one place where you find a stroma of reticular tissue.

sentences.english: But the service life that the stand or fall of in- house matrix is affecting mesa of fire prevention board.

sentences.english: Histopathologically the tumor is composed of stromal cells and abundant capillaries.

sentences.english: Influences of Hormones and Substrates on Cutting Rooting of Polygala arillata var.

sentences.english: Modified matrix coloration method was used to determine endotoxin content in plasma.
